actionType.description: Action type on leave request. Note : If actionType is 'changeStatus', status fields must be filled. If actionType is 'comment', comment fields must be filled

singleAMPM.description: Half day morning or evening, (required for 'half_day')

singleFromTime.description: Single day from time for specify time (required if specifying time)

singleToTime.description: Single day to time for specify time (required if specifying time)

partialOption.description: Partial day option Note : If partial option is 'all'  start day fields must be filled. If partial option is 'end'  end day fields must be filed. If partial option is 'start' start day fields must be filed. If partial option is 'start_end'  start and end day fields must be filed. If partial option is 'none'  No partial option.

startDayFromTime.description: Start day from time for specify time (required if specifying time)

startDayToTime.description: Start day to time for specify time (required if specifying time)

endDayAMPM.description: Half day morning or evening, (required for 'half_day')

endDayFromTime.description: End day from time for specify time (required if specifying time)
